tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
quoteText:
Changes to the Agreements

Occasionally we may make changes to the Agreements. When we make material changes to the Agreements, weâ€™ll provide you with notice as appropriate under the circumstances, e.g., by displaying a prominent notice within the Service or by sending you an email.
